00023 #include "pvector.hpp"
00024 
00025 namespace uStreamLib {
00026         PVector::PVector(void)
00027         {
00028                 PVectorUnsafe::setClassID(UOSUTIL_RTTI_PVECTOR);
00029         }
00030 
00031         PVector::~PVector(void)
00032         {
00033                 // lock mutex
00034                 MutexLocker ml(this);
00035         }
00036 
00037         int32 PVector::init(uint32 init_size, uint32 incr)
00038         {
00039                 int32 ret = 0;
00040 
00041                 // initialize parent
00042                 ret = PVectorUnsafe::init(init_size, incr);
00043                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00044                         return FAILURE;
00045 
00046                 // initialize parent
00047                 ret = Mutex::init();
00048                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00049                         return FAILURE;
00050 
00051                 // everything is ok
00052                 return SUCCESS;
00053         }
00054 }
